instruction.value: Apply patch to a non-irritated skin site with a flat surface.
Apply two patches (100 mcg/hour/patch) every 72 hours to a non-irritated skin site with a flat surface.
Apply one patch every 72 hours to a non-irritated skin site with a flat surface.
Apply two patches (25 mcg/hour/patch) every 72 hours to a non-irritated skin site with a flat surface.
Apply three patches (25 mcg/hour/patch) every 72 hours to a non-irritated skin site with a flat surface.
Apply two patches (50 mcg/hour/patch) every 72 hours to a non-irritated skin site with a flat surface.
Apply two patches (75 mcg/hour/patch) every 72 hours to a non-irritated skin site with a flat surface.

AdditionalNotes.value: Hair at application site should be clipped, not shaved.
